meanings.sent1: The scarab rolled the dung across the ground.
meanings.sent2: I saw a scarab crawling on the forest floor.
meanings.sent3: Why did the scarab bring the dung to the picnic?
meanings.sent4: The scarab's determination to move the dung was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The scarab's shiny shell caught my eye as it worked.

meanings.definition: A representation of a dung beetle used in ancient Egyptian jewelry and amulets.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful scarab pendant around her neck.
meanings.sent2: The scarab symbol was carved into the ancient artifact.
meanings.sent3: The scarab on the bracelet seemed to wink at me.
meanings.sent4: The scarab design on the ring was intricate and detailed.
meanings.sent5: The scarab on the necklace seemed to come to life under the light.
